API Docs for Sandy 3D Engine haXe Port, ver. 3.1.1

sandy.materials.attributes.CelShadeAttributes

type
class
extends
ALightAttributes
Realize a Cell shading on a material. Note: this class ignores all properties inherited from ALightAttributes!

Constructor

new()
parameters
p_oLightMap A lightmap that the object will use (default map has four shades of gray).
see
PhongAttributesLightMap
Create the CelShadeAttributes object.

Instance Variables hide inherited show inherited

ambient(__getAmbient,__setAmbient) : Float

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.ALightAttributes
Ambient reflection factor.

Note that since geometry of sprites is unknown, this is going to be the only lighting setting affecting them, so you would typically need to set it to bigger value than you would for shapes.

begin(default,method) : p_oScene : sandy.core.Scene3D -> Void

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.ALightAttributes
Method called before the display list rendering. This is the common place for this attribute to precompute things

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.ALightAttributes
Diffuse reflection factor.

specular(__getSpecular,__setSpecular) : Float

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.ALightAttributes
Specular reflection factor.

spherize : Float

Non-zero value adds sphere normals to actual normals for light rendering. Use this with flat surfaces or cylinders.

unlink(default,method) : p_oPolygon : sandy.core.data.Polygon -> Void

inherited from sandy.materials.attributes.ALightAttributes
Remove all the initialization opposite of init
